title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy, and mildly spiced tomato-based curry.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Simple and classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten chocolate center.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan, croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.

title: Sushi Platter
summary: Assorted fresh sushi rolls with salmon, tuna, and avocado.
